entry.title: Balloon Mini Model
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mini Model
Type: Terrarium Decoration
Price: 9.95

Get away from it all with this tiny hot air balloon - one of eleven designs in the range of Mini Models.

Each pack contains one brass model with step by step assembly instructions. Simply fold the metal into shape. No adhesives are required but tweezers or small pliers may be helpful.

Contents: metal model, instructions
Materials: coated stainless steel, paper
Product Dimensions: 30 x 34 x 38mm
Packaging Dimensions: 12.5 x 17.5cm
Product Weight: 10g

entry.title: Chamomile Herb Bookmark
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Stationery
Price: 4.95

Inspired by dried herbs, the sweet smell and calming properties of Chamomile, our Chamomile bookmark is beautifully etched in steel with daisy-like details, complete with a colourful lime green cord. 

Sadly, no smell included! But pair with a good book for a relaxing read. 


To use, simply place in your book and drape the cord over a page to mark your place. 


If you like this design, take a look at our Lavender and Thyme bookmark!


Contents: One steel etched, herb bookmark with colourful cord. 

Packaging: 100% recycled FSC paper in a plastic-free cello wrap

entry.title: Thyme Herb Bookmark
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Stationery
Price: 4.95

Inspired by dried herbs, and the delicious and aromatic smell of Thyme, our Thyme bookmark is intricately etched in steel complete with a pink cord. Sadly, no smell included! A great bookmark to mark your place in a recipe book!  


To use, simply place in your book and drape the cord over a page to mark your place. 


If you like this design, take a look at our Chamomile and Lavender bookmark!


Contents: One steel etched, herb bookmark with colourful cord. 

Packaging: 100% recycled FSC paper in a plastic-free cello wrap

entry.title: Lavender Herb Bookmark
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 4.95

Inspired by dried herbs, and the soothing smell of Lavender, our Lavender bookmark is beautifully etched in steel, complete with a colourful blue cord. Sadly, no actual smell is included! 


To use, simply place in your book and drape the cord over a page to mark your place. 

If you like this design, take a look at our Chamomile and Thyme bookmark!


Contents: One steel etched, herb bookmark with colourful cord. 

Packaging: 100% recycled FSC paper in a plastic-free cello wrap

entry.title: Plant Animal Tamarin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 5.75

Our collections of Plant Animals are a fun way to decorate your house plants!

This super sweet Tamarin, complete with a quintessential moustache, rests over your plants stems. Simply fold its hands over the stem.

Our lovely primate is one of 26 intriguing creatures for your houseplants. Collect the whole plant gang:

Bush Baby • Chameleon • Flying Squirrel • Fox • Frog • Fruit Bat • Koala • Meerkat • Monkey • Orangutang • Owl • Pangolin • Parrot • Praying Mantis • Raccoon • Sloth • Snake • Squirrel • Lemur • Chimpanzee • Damselfly • Flying Lizard • Anteater

Contents: 1 x Brass Plant Animal approx - cm

Corrosion resistant brass

Packaging: FSC Paper with a biodegradable cellophane wrap - 15 x 5cm

entry.summary:
Vendor: Mini Model
Type: Model Kits
Price: 10.50

Own your own tiny submarine with this miniature model kit. Packed flat, it's an easy to post gift for any nautical lover.

Each pack contains one brass flat pack model with step by step assembly instructions. Simply fold the metal into shape. No adhesives are required but tweezers or small pliers will be helpful.

This tiny object of desire is one of eleven designs in the range of mini-onaires.

Contents: metal model, instructions
Materials: coated stainless steel, paper
Product Dimensions: 48 x 24 x 34mm
Packaging Dimensions: 10.5 x 10.5cm
Product Weight: 10g

Vendor: Mini Model

Price: 10.50

Feel like a mini millionaire with this tiny object of desire! Be the ruler of your own tiny kingdom with this castle. A perfect little edition to add to your shelf, terrarium or plant pot!

Each pack contains one brass model with step by step assembly instructions. Simply fold the metal into shape. No adhesives are required but tweezers or small pliers may be helpful.

Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 5.75

Our range of Plant Animals houseplant decorations are a fun way to make your own tiny rainforest!

This adorable little Anteater aka Tamandua, hugs to your houseplants stems, tough outstretched to nibble on those ants! 

Our sweet little animal is one of 26 intriguing creatures for your houseplants. Collect the whole plant gang:

Bush Baby • Chameleon • Flying Squirrel • Fox • Frog • Fruit Bat • Koala • Meerkat • Monkey • Orangutang • Owl • Pangolin • Parrot • Praying Mantis • Raccoon • Sloth • Snake • Squirrel • Lemur • Chimpanzee • Damselfly • Flying Lizard • Tamarin

entry.title: Tradescantia Bookmark
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bookmarks
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 6.95

The Tradescantia bookmark is a fun way to mark the pages of an equally adventurous story.

A plant bursting with colour and character. It’s zig-zagging stems and spear-shaped leaves grow quickly and everywhere if you don’t watch out!

If you like this design, take a look at our Golden Pothos bookmark too!

Contents: 1x hanging bookmark
Materials: Stainless Steel, FSC paper
Packaging Dimensions: 105 x 148mm

entry.title: Brass Bird Decoration
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 8.95

A beautifully etched brass bird mobile.

Packed flat, it simply folds together to create an elegant hanging bird decoration. Display with your plants or from a shelf.

Each pack contains one brass model with assembly instructions. Simply fold the metal into shape, no adhesives or tools required!

Contents: x1 brass model, and assembly instructions.
Product Dimensions:80mm diameter
Packaging:148 x 105mm printed on FSC 100% recycled paper, sealed in a plastic free compostable cello wrap. 
Weight: 10g

entry.title: Brass Blooms Bouquet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 11.95

Brass Blooms are elegant decorative ornaments for your plants. 

This bouquet set includes a delicate cosmos, a stem of lilies, a sprig of gypsophila and an elegant freesia. If only they smelt as good as they look! 
Gently twist the flowers from their sheet and place them in your plant pot, terrarium or a decorative vase to add a floral flourish to any room!
Also available in Wildflowers and Garden. 

Contents: 1 x Brass Bloom sheet, set of 4 flowers 
Packaging: 100% recycled FSC Paper with a biodegradable plastic free wrap - 20 x 15cm 
Made from corrosion resistant brass with beautiful etched accents.

entry.title: Plant Animal Set - Reptiles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Default
Price: 17.25

Plant Animals are playful creatures for your houseplants!

Elevate your indoor rainforest with our Plant Animal Reptile set. Featuring a Snake, a Chameleon and a Flying Lizard.

Etched in metal, the Chameleon hugs the stems of your plants, the flying lizard hangs from a stem and the snake slides onto a leaf of desire.

Contents: Plant Animal Chameleon, Snake and Flying Lizard

 

Corrosion resistant brass
Packaging: FSC Paper with a biodegradable cellophane wrap - 15 x 5cm

entry.title: Houseplant Bookmarks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Stationery
Price: 7.95

A great gift for the indoor gardener or plant lover! This little set of decorative bookmarks feature four favourite indoor house plants: Monstera Delicious, Pilea Peperomioides, Calathea and a Sansevieria.

Made from stainless steel, the bookmarks simple clip onto a page.

Contents: Four page markers
Materials: Stainless steel, paper
Packaging Dimensions: 105 x 148mm

entry.title: Brass Blooms Wildflowers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 11.95

Brass Bloom Wildflowers are botanical ornaments for your plants! Designed in Aimee's London garden during the summer lockdown of 2020. 

These etched brass flowers that are always in bloom. Stand them in your plant pots to create a mini indoor meadow, or place them in a terrarium to create a little wonderland. 

Included in the set: A bright and bold Corn Marigold, a feathery delicate Nigella flower, the romantic Forget Me Not, and a wild and hardy Cornflower.

Contents: 1 x Brass Bloom sheet, set of 4 flowers 
Packaging: FSC Paper with a biodegradable cellophane wrap - 20 x 15cm 
Made from corrosion resistant brass with beautiful etched accents.

entry.title: Mini Mushrooms - Steel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 9.95

Mini Mushrooms are fun decorative ornaments for your plants! 

Create a mini woodland scene with this fabulous set of brass fungi. Included in the set is Fly Agaric, Enoki, Ink caps and Chanterelle.

These sweet little mushrooms are ideal for livening up your plants or terrarium by simply pushing the mushrooms into the soil.

Contents: 1 x Steel Mini Mushroom set
Packaging: FSC Paper with a biodegradable cellophane wrap - 125 x 175mm

entry.title: Boat Mini Model
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mini Model
Type: Model Kits
Price: 10.50

Set sail on the Seven Seas with our Minimodel boat! Our little Ship doesn’t float so you won’t get suck in the Doldrums. Place your boat on a windowsill and watch her sail the skies. Pirate flag not included.


Pair with our MINImodel submarine for the full Nautical experience.
Instructions included, simply fold the metal into shape, gently bend the sails for the impression of a windy sea. No adhesives are required but tweezers or small pliers may be helpful.


Contents: 1x brass coated model - 40 x 18 x 54mm  

Packaging: 100% recycled FSC paper with a biodegradable cellophane wrap - 105 x 105mm

entry.title: Plant Flags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 9.95

Plant Flags for your potted plants!

Our plant flags come in a set for three. Each flag is individually detailed, etched in brass and complete with wire posts and blank labels. Stand them in your plant pots and use them as reminders for care tips, plant identification, and more.

Dimensions: 125 x 175mm
Contents: Three plant flags complete with frame, wire, and labels
Material: Brass, Paper coated metal wire, Paper, biodegradable packaging.

entry.title: Brass Bloom Garden
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 11.95

Brass Bloom are decorative ornaments for your plants. This new garden set features a sweet little Pansy, a glorious Poppy, a delicate Lily-of-the-Valley and a bold Echinacea.

Gently twist the flowers free from the sheet and stand Place them in your plant pots or terrarium to create a mini garden that is always in bloom.


Contents: 1x Brass Bloom sheet with 4 flowers
Made from corrosion resistant brass
Packaging: 100% recycled FSC paper with a biodegradable cellophane film

Flower measurements are approximately:
Pansy - 8.5cm x 2
Poppy - 13cm x 3.5
Lily-of-the-Valley - 10cm x 2cm
Echinacea - 15cm x 3cm

entry.title: Plant Animal Set - Tropical Birds
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Default
Price: 17.25

Plant Animals are fun decorative creatures for your houseplants!

Create an indoor aviary with our collection of tropical birds. This set features our Parrot, Flamingo and Toucan. 

Etched in metal, the Toucan and Parrot slide over your plants stem and the Flamingo stands tall in a plant pot or terrarium. 

A great gift idea for lovers of exotic birds, all things Audubon, and ornithologists!

Contents: Plant Animal Parrot, Toucan & Flamingo
Corrosion resistant brass
Packaging: FSC Paper with a biodegradable cellophane wrap - 15 x 5cm

entry.title: Plant Animal Toucan
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 5.75

Plant Animals are a playful way to make your own mini menagerie.
Our terrific Plant Animal Toucan, is etched in brass, boasting a beautiful bill. Place the Toucan on your most tropical plant, by simply straddling his legs over the stems of the plant. 
Like tropical birds? The Toucan gets along well with our Plant Animal Flamingo & Parrot! 

The Toucan is one of 24 fun creatures for your houseplants. Collect the whole plant gang:

Bush Baby • Chameleon • Flying Squirrel • Fox • Frog • Fruit Bat • Koala • Meerkat • Monkey • Orangutang • Owl • Pangolin • Parrot • Praying Mantis • Raccoon • Sloth • Snake • Squirrel • Lemur • Chimpanzee • Damselfly • Flying Lizard • Flamingo • Toucan 

Contents: 1 x Brass Plant Animal approx 5L x 3.5W cm
Corrosion resistant brass
Packaging: FSC Paper with a biodegradable cellophane wrap - 15 x 5cm

entry.title: Plant Animal Flamingo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 5.75

Plant Animals are a delightful way to make your own tropical jungle.
Our flamboyant Plant Animal Flamingo is intricately etched in brass with delicate feathered details. The Flamingo stands proud in your terrarium or plant pot, by simply pushing her into the soil. 
Like tropical birds? The Flamingo gets along well with our Plant Animal Toucan & Parrot! 

This fabulous Flamingo is one of 24 fun creatures for your houseplants. Collect the whole plant gang:

Bush Baby • Chameleon • Flying Squirrel • Fox • Frog • Fruit Bat • Koala • Meerkat • Monkey • Orangutang • Owl • Pangolin • Parrot • Praying Mantis • Raccoon • Sloth • Snake • Squirrel • Lemur • Chimpanzee • Damselfly • Flying Lizard • Flamingo • Toucan 

Contents: 1 x Brass Plant Animal approx 8L x 4.5W cm
Corrosion resistant brass
Packaging: FSC Paper with a biodegradable cellophane wrap - 15 x 5cm
